snippet.title: Percy the Potty Pigeon (1984 / 2022 Re-crack) Walkthrough, ZX Spectrum
snippet.description:
Huge playlist archive with games from 1982-1992: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLxOanVBhqd3uy0uOIHzPaxfOp53uJLX7-
Many more games from the 80s can be found here:
Racing games: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLxOanVBhqd3vkkE35mCw6x63QFBnU9Xsi
AY / GFX improved games: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLxOanVBhqd3t74YnYAJA9p4vMQYZYCJWX
Updated 2022 version of a great looking classic game, now with new loading screen by Andy Green, which is based on the cassette cover. Trainer options is also added. It was made by Tiboh and Beta Disk scl and trd files can be downloaded here: https://vtrd.in/release.php?r=15fe72a0395e4c97b2abfe40f5a5f829

The game has five levels, and when level 5 is completed it loops to the start of level 5 again.
